titleStmt.title: The last speech and prayer with other passages of Thomas Venner, the chief incourager and promoter of the late horrid rebellion immediately before his execution in Coleman-street on Saturday last being the 19th of Ianuary, 1660 : together with the names of the rest that were condemned for the same fact.
titleStmt.author: Venner, Thomas, d. 1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
